main event: A stationary, pulsating object emitting a bright, glowing light was observed in the sky for 1 hour and 25 minutes in Hosperus, Colorado on 8-6-56.
interesting points: The object was stationary and appeared to pulsate, emitting a bright glowing light.
The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 25 minutes, allowing for a detailed observation.
The evaluation of the sighting suggests that the object was likely a balloon.
Photographs were taken during the observation, providing visual evidence of the object.
The observation was categorized as a Ground-Visual type, indicating a clear visual sighting from the ground.
sighted object: stationary, pulsating object emitting a bright, glowing light
